title: Ghost Game
body: My account will not let me play. It says im in a game and it is giving me the reconnecting page but whenever i press reconnect it leads into a black screen and after a few seconds says that they could not connect. What do I  do? Also im playing on a mac

replies.body: Thanks for the help! It is working just fine now.

Are you still having this issue?  A ghost game would only occur after the game ended, but the server has yet communicated the match has ended.  Usually relogging or waiting it out should fix this.  Did your match end?  Let me know!
